name: Diablo III GBC
description:
Controls: Movement - Arrow Keys (aka Game Boy D-Pad) Primary Attack - Q (aka Game Boy A) Secondary Attack - E (aka Game Boy B) Unreliable Medicine - Q + E (aka Game Boy A + B) Ultimate Attack - R (aka Game Boy Select) 

"Diablo III GBC" is a Game Boy Color recreation of Diabolo 3 made for the Retro Jam. The challenge was to recreate a game in the style of an older console. Our entry features the Butcher boss fight in the Chamber of Suffering, as well as the Halls of Agony leading up to it. The topic "side effects" was implemented in the form of an "unreliable potion" that, when taken, can disorient you and mess up your controls, freeze you for three seconds or make your skills cost life instead of mana or fury.
